text: @KirstieMAllsopp @BBCNewsnight Exactly Kirstie. This whole thing is hysterical nonsense for the vast majority. So sad many just don't have the smarts to realise it. Just 238 sub 60 year olds have died from #Covid19 without pre-existing conditions. Yet we deep freeze the economy & risk penury for decades!
